title: Well maintained beautiful Scott Spark mountain bike
text: Beautiful , well maintained and competitive bike. Scott spark mountain bike - Carbon saddle post , carbon handlebars , carbon frame! Tons of extras have been added to the bike throughout its life. Regularly serviced and maintained by Cycle Lab Fourwayscomponents breaks - Shimano DTSRAM GX crank and peddles SRAM GX durailer and chain Eagle gearing - 9 gears on the back - 1 in the front for racing and mountain biking for fun.Tyres are still new and chain is always lubed.Fox forks - top of the range suspension that has been maintained and serviced regularly. Bike looks super neat and happy to throw in the saddle bag with the required extras. Happy to negotiate - selling the bike to support our son in Super-bike racing and the bike does not get used as we have other racing bicycles that we have been usingcontact Tristan on 060 616 2144 please no time wasters.

title: 2021 GIANT STANCE E+2 29ER
text: Steep climbs, technical descents, longer days on the trail. With a smooth suspension setup and a seamless boost of pedaling support, this E-bike gives you the power and technology to ride the trails you dream about.Designed with trail-friendly geometry, Stance E+ helps beginner or intermediate trail riders experience off-road E-bike riding at its best. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. The EnergyPak battery system lets you extend the ride, and now you can charge it up quickly with a newly designed smart charger.MotorGiant SyncDrive SportControllerGiant RideControl One ANT+DisplayWireless display compatibleBatteryGiant EnergyPak Smart 500, 36V Integrated Lithium-IonSizesS, M, L, XLColorsBalsam GreenFrameALUXX SL-grade aluminum, 120mm FlexPoint suspension systemForkSR Suntour XCR 34 Air LO-R, 130mm travel, tapered steerer, Lockout, 110x15 Quick-Loc thru-axleShockRockShox Monarch R, High Volume, 184x44mm, custom tunedHandlebarGiant Connect TR Riser 31.8x780mmStemGiant ContactSeatpostGiant 30.9mm, 2-bolt Micro Adjustable, Forged AluminiumSaddleGiant SportPedalsAluminum PlatformShiftersShimano DeoreFront DerailleurGiant Custom Chain GuideRear DerailleurShimano Deore, 10-Speed, Shadow+BrakesTektro HD-M745 Orion, 4-piston, hydraulic disc, 203mmBrake LeversTektro HD-M745 OrionCassetteShimano CS-M4100-10, 11-46T, 10-SpeedChainKMC e.10 Sport, e-bike optimizedCranksetForged Alloy minimal Q-factor, 36T Steel Direct Mount ring (S:160, M/L:165, XL:170)Bottom BracketN/ARimsGiant XCT 29 Tubeless Ready 25mm e-bike optimizedHubsGiant eTracker Sport, [F] 15mm Thru-Axle [R] 141mm QRSpokesStainless SteelTiresMaxxis Rekon 29x2.4" foldable, 60tpi, EXO, Tubeless ReadyExtrasGiant EnergyPak 6A Smart chargerWeightThe most accurate way to determine any bike’s weight is to have your local dealer weigh it for you. Many brands strive to list the lowest possible weight, but in reality weight can vary based on size, finish, hardware and accessories. title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: 2021 SCOTT SPARK 900 (TEAM ISSUE)
text:
Selling my 2021 Scott spark 900 Team Issue (Large frame) The bike is in mint condition. Had it for a year, but havent used it alot and also never dropped it. Scratches are very very minimal, with actually just one (about 1cm) on the side because of a bike rack in December. 

Tyres are tubeless ready and ready to go. 
Casette is in mint condition. Have never felt that it slipped on me. I also put on a new chain to protect the teeth of the casette. 

The Lyne dropper post is also quite new. Still works perfectly. I do sell it for an extra R2500 if you are interrested. I also do not sell the cleats with the bike

The shocks are also in great condition and have never had a leak. The Spark 2021 comes with a twin-lock system meaning it can lock the front and back suspention at the same time. Has 3 modes. 

Like I said, the bike is very close to brand new on the way it looks and hasnt been used alot. 

Tyres still have 90-85% to go

This nimble and manoeuvrable little electric bike is

rear.

significantly.

setting.

All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time

10 Speed long range drive train provides a

Free delivery in South Africa

title: FUJI Tahoe 1.0, Small Frame, Shimano 1x11, RockShox
text:
This Fuji Tahoe 1.0 is a great starter bike. Suitable for a shorter rider, it's get everything you need. With its brand new 1x11 speed drivetrain, just jump on and enjoy the ride.

Fuji is a Japanese company which has been making bikes for over 100 years.

It comes with:

-S/M lightweight and durable Fuji 6061 aluminum alloy frame
-RockShox TK Silver Air Shocks with remote lockout
-Brand new Shimano SLX 11 speed rapid fire shifter
-Brand new Shimano Deore 11spd rear derailleur
-Brand New 11 speed Sunrace 11/50T wide ratio casette
-Brand new Deckas 32T long tooth chainring
-Brand new 11spd chain
-WTB double Walled alloy rims with WTB tyres in good condition.
-Fuji Saddle post, clamp and Saddle
-Fuji alloy stem and handlebars
-Shimano Hydraulic Brakes front and back

Extras: Shuman Clip-on Pedals + 2 Bottle cages

*THE PRICE IS SLIGHTLY NEGOTIABLE

*BASED IN FLORIDA, ROODEPOORT
*DELIVERY CAN BE ARRANGED

text:
-Lightweight Hydroformed Aluminium Frame is designed to withstand all the bumps, knocks and crashes your little shredder throws at it. A low stand over heights aids children’s confidence.
-SR Suntour Front Suspension Fork smoothes the ride.
-Shimano 7 Speed Gears are robust and easy to use.
-Tektro V-brakes are proven to work and they are made from metal which can withstand more abuse than a plastic brake.
-TR Junior Grips are designed to meet the needs of a young rider. A smaller diameter and softer compound means a better grip. 
-Selle Royal Saddle provides extra comfort for extended periods of riding.
-Adjustable Saddle & Seat Post make the bike adjustable as your child grows.

Perfect helmet for high demands in cyclocross and road cycling. This helmet is characterised by MIPS brain protection system, Halo 3D adjustment system and an unparalleled ventilation. The removable visor changes your look when needed for MTB or road biking.

ETRIKE R54,850.00 VAT Inclusive

 

This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque.

range significantly.

provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting.

All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe

for its application.

Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

Free delivery in South Africa

A GT 6061 MTB specific bicycle in extremely good condition. It was custom ordered from London and has top of the range features. Such as juicy three brake systems, shimano deore dual gears, GT 6061 mtb specific handles, a GT triple triangle frame, enhanced suspension (fit for any weight) and bottle holders. 

The tyres have good tread and the bicycle runs perfectly. Reason for selling: I don’t ride anymore. This is a perfect bike for anyone from larger children to adults doing serious mountain biking and races.

title: Silverback Stride SE 17.5” Mountain Bike
text:
Used but excellent condition 2012 Silverback Stride SE mountain bike - ideal for beginner. Includes Concept Dual Ride cleat pedals.

Full specifications as follows:

Bottom bracket	  VP Components
Brakes	  Silverback Concepts V-Brake
Cassette	Shimano MFZ-21 14-28T
Crankset	Suntour 28/38/48T

Features	
Butted frames made from 6061 Aluminium Alloy with added Magnesium to be strong , light and durable. Frame has integrated headset and disc brake ready frame, forks and wheels for easy future upgrade on models without hydraulic disc brakes. SBC components used to enforce design concept and bring refined quality to user’s control points. Low tread tyres for better, faster rolling. Replaceable dropout Hangers. Wide low -riser bars increase rider comfort, control and leverage over big wheels in extreme terrain while keeping the setup at a decent height for climbing. Forks equipped with manual lockout feature for better efficiency during uphill efforts or sprints. Stainless steel spokes. Double wall rims.

Fork type	Silverback Concepts 60mm
Frame type	Aluminium
Front derailleur	Shimano TZ-Series
Hub front	Silverback Concepts Steel QR
Hub rear	Silverback Concepts Steel QR
Pedals	 Concept DualRide
Rear derailleur	Shimano TX-Series
Recommended for	MTB Recreation
Rims type	Aluminium Rims
Shifters	Shimano RevoShift 21 Speed
Tires	CST 26" x 1.95

Bike was only used a few times, and serviced once by Evobike Durbanville, so is in excellent working condition.

title: ELECTRIC BIKES COMPLETE E-MTB BUILT IN S.A OR CONVERT YOUR MTB TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikes built in SA . We personalize e-bikes for people by focusing on one's desired riding experience. E-bikes individually built to satisfy different forms of adventure or exercise. Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your performance.Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :1. Type of terrain.2. Torque.3. Speed.4. Range.5. Frame size.6. Weight.7. Riding preferences .Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)Your height ( right frame size )Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)WHAT WE LEARNT AFTER 15 YEARS OF CONVERTING BICYCLES TO ELECTRIC:1. SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONYour bicycle professionally converted to electric by a team who has over 10 years experience in electric bike building over 30 years in bicycle building and servicing .In 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued using our quality Int'l EU standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.Your e-bike is compatible with most batteries and bicyle components in the market and therefore when it comes to the time when you need to replace anything you have a wider choice.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeBRANCHES IN CAPE TOWN AND JOHANNESBURG.

title: COMMERCIAL ETRIKE Wow Ebike
text:
This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

Trike is fitted with. 

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 

·        
It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V
Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South
African designed, tested, and manufactured EBIKE

info@wowbike.co.za
